thought: The Slack action (action_1) is not implemented correctly; the params are empty causing the workflow execution error. I need to set the required parameters including selecting the channel by name 'news', messageType as 'text', and text parameter to extract the 'text' field from input_data using expression.
plan: Set params for action_1 with select='channel'
Set text='={{$json["text"]}}' to extract text from input_data
Test Slack message sending after fixing params
